mapper.insert: insert into db_test_case (case_no, transaction_name, test_type, desinger_name, status,input_data,test_procedures,expected_result, auctual_result,create_time) values (#{caseNo}, #{transactionName}, #{testType}, #{desingerName},0, #{inputData}, #{testProcedures}, #{expectedResult},#{auctualResult}, now());
mapper.select:
select dbl.id, dbl.case_no as caseNo, dbl.transaction_name as transactionName, dbl.test_type as testType, dbl.desinger_name as desingerName, dbl.status as status, dbl.input_data as inputData, dbl.test_procedures as testProcedures, dbl.expected_result as expectedResult, dbl.auctual_result as auctualResult, dbl.create_time as createTime, dt.apply, dbau.admin_fullname as adminFullname from db_test_case dbl left join db_task dt on dbl.task_id = dt.id left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dt.test_user_id
where 1=1
and dt.test_user_id=#{userId}
and (dbl.case_no LIKE concat(concat("%",#{caseNoSearch}),"%"))
and (dt.apply LIKE concat(concat("%",#{applySearch}),"%"))
and (dbl.desinger_name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{desingerNameSearch}),"%"))
order by dbl.create_time DESC limit #{page} , #{limit};

select count(*)
from db_test_case dbl left join db_task dt on dbl.task_id = dt.id left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dt.test_user_id
where 1=1
and dt.test_user_id=#{userId}
and (dbl.case_no LIKE concat(concat("%",#{caseNoSearch}),"%"))
and (dt.apply LIKE concat(concat("%",#{applySearch}),"%"))
and (dbl.desinger_name LIKE concat(concat("%",#{desingerNameSearch}),"%"))

select dbl.id, dbl.case_no as caseNo, dbl.transaction_name as transactionName, dbl.test_type as testType, dbl.desinger_name as desingerName, dbl.status as status, dbl.input_data as inputData, dbl.test_procedures as testProcedures, dbl.expected_result as expectedResult, dbl.auctual_result as auctualResult, dbl.create_time as createTime, dt.apply, dbau.admin_fullname as adminFullname from db_test_case dbl left join db_task dt on dbl.task_id = dt.id left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dt.test_user_id where id = #{testCaseId}

select dbl.id, dbl.case_no as caseNo, dbl.transaction_name as transactionName, dbl.test_type as testType, dbl.desinger_name as desingerName, dbl.status as status, dbl.input_data as inputData, dbl.test_procedures as testProcedures, dbl.expected_result as expectedResult, dbl.auctual_result as auctualResult, dbl.create_time as createTime, dt.apply, dbau.admin_fullname as adminFullname from db_test_case dbl left join db_task dt on dbl.task_id = dt.id left join db_admin_user dbau on dbau.id = dt.test_user_id order by dbl.create_time DESC;
